elements.description:
endpoint, it should be verified that the status code returned is 403 and the message in the response body is

name: As an administrator (admin), I should be able to access the relevant announcement data by entering id through the API connection.

elements.name: The creation of the new announcement record to be created through the API must be verified through the API.

steps.name: The api user sets "api/getNoticeById" path parameters.
The api user prepares a GET request containing the 393 information to send to the api getNoticeById endpoint.
The api user sends a GET body and saves the returned response.
The api user verifies that the status code is 200.
The api user verifies that the "message" information in the response body is "Success".

name: As an administrator (admin), I want to be able to create a new announcement record via API connection.

elements.name: Invalid Token when a GET request is sent to the /api/visitorsList endpoint with invalid authorization information,
elements.description:
it should be verified that the status code returned is 403 and
  the message in the response body is "You do not have authorization or token error.".

steps.name: Api user sets "api/visitorsList" path parameters.
The api user sends a GET request, then saves the returned response, and verifies that the status code is '403' with the reason phrase Forbidden.

name: As an administrator (admin) I should be able to access the Visitor List via API connection.

elements.name: When sending a GET body with valid authorization information and correct data (id) to the
elements.description:
/api/visitorsId endpoint, it should be verified that the status code returned is 200 and
  he message information in the response body is “Success”.

steps.name: Api user sets "api/visitorsId" path parameters.
Api user prepares a GET request containing 1137 info to send to api visitorsId endpoint.
Api user sends a GET body and saves response.
Api user verifies Status Code 200.
Api user verifies "message" information in the response body is "Success".
Api user verifies the data in response body includes "1137", "Online", "Hello", "RoSlads", "emilyjonesg89@gmail.com".

elements.name: When a GET body containing valid authorization information and invalid data (id) is sent to the
elements.description:
/api/visitorsId endpoint, the status code returned is
  203 and the message information in the response body is
  "No id or wrong id."  It should be verified that it is.

steps.name: Api user sets "api/visitorsId" path parameters.
